snippet.title: Dash Hale - Trailer (English)
snippet.description:
Who needs weapons when they can control the ground they’re on?
Better still: why not have both?

Dash Hale is a fast-paced runner where stopping is not an option, but turning the ground into a free fall is - bringing your enemies along.

Earth-invading aliens, brain-eating zombies, mankind-enslaving machines: you've faced them all before, but probably not like this.

Wishlist now on
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1485730/Dash_Hale/

Out on April 2022.
